mapper.sql: a.menu_id AS menuId, a.menu_name AS menuName, a.menu_url AS menuUrl, a.menu_level AS menuLevel, a.menu_icon AS menuIcon, a.menu_order AS menuOrder
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu( menu_name, menu_url, menu_level, menu_icon, menu_order ) VALUES ( #{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{menuLevel}, #{menuIcon}, #{menuOrder} )
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_url = #{menuUrl}, menu_level = #{menuLevel}, menu_icon = #{menuIcon}, menu_order = #{menuOrder} WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
